title: Suspicious Grinning Eye
summaries: The Suspicious Grinning Eye is a pet-summoning item that summons a Suspicious Eye pet which resembles the Eye of Cthulhu. It normally shows a blue iris and pupil, but when moving faster than 31 mph the pupil slides up and reveals a mouth, similar to the Eye of Cthulhu's second form. The Suspicious Grinning Eye has a 1/4 (25%) chance of being dropped by the Eye of Cthulhu in Master Mode.

statistics.Tooltip:
Summons a suspicious eye
'Seems to have lost its look.'
statistics.Sell: 5 GC
